XIII.i.1.B.2.c
.
Rating Decisions for Veterans’ Disability Claims
In Veterans’ disability cases, because of the requirement for permanency of the total disability, submit cases to the rating activity for a rating decision if a
specific rating determination of eligibility for DEA has not been made, and
a future examination has not been scheduled.
References
:  For more information on
partial rating decisions and deferred issues, see
M21-1, Part V, Subpart ii, 3.B.1
, and
rating determinations of DEA eligibility, see
M21-1, Part XIII, Subpart i, 1.A
.
title: M21-1, Part XIII, Subpart i, Chapter 1, Section B - Notification and Award Actions for Dependents' Educational Assistance (DEA)
